----------simple_1----------
	SIGNAL ram : ram_type := (
   0     => "0000000000000001",
   1     => "0001000000000011",
   2     => "0011000001000000",
   3     => "1111000000000000",
   OTHERS => "0000000000000000"
);

----------simple_2----------
	SIGNAL ram : ram_type := (
   0     => "1110001000000001",
   1     => "1110001000000001",
   2     => "1110001100000001",
   3     => "1110010000000001",
   4     => "1110001100000000",
   5     => "1110001100000000",
   6     => "1110011100000000",
   7     => "1110100100000000",
   8     => "1111000000000000",
   OTHERS => "0000000000000000"
);

----------simple_3----------
	SIGNAL ram : ram_type := (
   
   0     => "0000010111000001",
   1     => "0000000000001001",
   2     => "1111010000000000",
   3     => "1111010000000000",
   4     => "1111010000000000",
   5     => "1111010000000000",
   6     => "1111010000000000",
   7     => "0000010111000000",
   8     => "0000000000001000",
   9     => "0000010111000010",
   10     => "0000000000000010",
   11     => "1111000000000000",
   12     => "0000110111000011",
   13     => "1111111111110100",
   OTHERS => "0000000000000000"
   );


----------simple_4----------
	SIGNAL ram : ram_type := (
   
   0     => "0000000000001001",
   1     => "0001101001010011",
   2     => "0100100001110000",
   3     => "0000000000000010",
   4     => "1000001001011000",
   5     => "1110010100111000",
   6     => "0000000000000011",
   7     => "1111000000000000",
   OTHERS => "0000000000000000"
   );

----------T_1----------
	SIGNAL ram : ram_type := (
   
   0     => "0000110111000000",
   1     => "0000000000010011",
   2     => "0111000001000001",
   3     => "0000010111000011",
   4     => "0000000000010100",
   5     => "1110001100000000",
   6     => "1000110111001011",
   7     => "0000000000001100",
   8     => "1100100000000010",
   9     => "0000001011110111",
   10     => "0000000000001001",
   11     => "1110001100000000",
   12     => "1100010000000010",
   13     => "1110001000000011",
   14     => "1100001111111001",
   15     => "1111000000000000",
   16     => "0000000000000000",
   17     => "0000000000000111",
   18     => "0000000000000100",
   19     => "0000000000000101",
   20     => "0000000000000011",
   21     => "0000000000000110",
   22     => "0000000000000001",
   23     => "0000000000001000",
   24     => "0000000000000010",
   OTHERS => "0000000000000000"
   );
----------T_2----------
	SIGNAL ram : ram_type := (
   
   0     => "0000110111000000",
   1     => "0000000000010110",
   2     => "0000010111000001",
   3     => "0000000000010100",
   4     => "0000010111000011",
   5     => "0000000000000000",
   6     => "1000001001000011",
   7     => "1100100000000101",
   8     => "0001010001110111",
   9     => "0000000000001101",
   10     => "1110001100000000",
   11     => "1100101111111001",
   12     => "1100000000000100",
   13     => "0011010001110111",
   14     => "0000000000001001",
   15     => "1110001100000000",
   16     => "1100101111110100",
   17     => "1111000000000000",
   18     => "0000000000000000",
   19     => "0000000000000111",
   20     => "0000000000000100",
   21     => "1111111111111010",
   22     => "0000000000000011",
   23     => "1111111111111001",
   24     => "1111111111111110",
   25     => "0000000000001000",
   26     => "1111111111111101",
   OTHERS => "0000000000000000"
   );
